verses.verse: Efrayim <WH669> feedeth <WH7462> <WH8802> on wind <WH7307>, and followeth <WH7291> <WH8802> after the east wind <WH6921>: he daily <WH3117> increaseht <WH7235> <WH8686> lies <WH3577> and desolation <WH7701>; and they do make <WH3772> <WH8799> a covenant <WH1285> with the Ashurns <WH804>, and oil <WH8081> is carried <WH2986> <WH8714> into Egypt <WH4714>.
